name: Lutinha
description:
Just a simple fighting game without any history behind. P1 Controls: W - Move up
A - Move left
S - Move down
D - Move right
H - Attack 1
J - Attack 2 (only for v1.01)
G - Block attacks P2 Controls: Up arrow key - Move up
Left arrow key - Move left
Down arrow key - Move down
Right arrow key - Move right
Numpad 5 - Attack 1
Numpad 6 - Attack 2 (only for v1.01)
Numpad 0 - Block attacks Updates

Update v1.02 - General bug fixes, including sprites issues and characters going out of the viewport

Update v1.01 - Added a new attack to each character

Credits One of the heroes by rvros from itch.io
